wikipedia_page.main: Scott Andrews (born 1 August 1989) is a Welsh international rugby union player for Pro14 side Cardiff Blues. He plays mainly as a prop, but can also cover lock and hooker.

response: *Scott Andrews (rugby union, born 1989), Wales international rugby union player, prop forward
*Scott Andrews (rugby union, born 1994), Welsh rugby union player, lock forward
* Scott Andrews from  Cardiff Blues (season-long loan)
* Scott Andrews to  Worcester Warriors (season-long loan)
